Gosh, I didn't want to leave. This is a magnetic family.
What delightful people and what a delightful home in tranquil Shawnee. I could live here. Wanda mentioned the house was older but it doesn't look old, it doesn't feel old; it feels perfectly nice. They have clearly done many upgrades.
In my room I went barefoot, which is the Hawaiian way, and there was not a speck of dust or dirt anywhere. She told me she wipes down the floor after every guest. Personally, I do not feel comfortable staying anywhere that is not clean, and Dr. Wanda gets the gold star. Everything needed was provided. They let me open the windows too, because I enjoy fresh air.
Wanda and Tyrone are expert hosts. They have had a variety of visitors in their welcoming home for years from all over the world. They have kind of seen it all, and like the daughter they mentioned, they have a world view helping them to accommodate. They truly know how to make you feel comfortable. I loved everything about their place and I especially enjoyed our conversations. Tyrone and Wanda are educated erudite people who can pursue a train of thought into it's depths with discrimination and perception. I appreciated and enjoyed their observations.
I think we are all here in this world to learn, to grow, and to help others. They almost treat their Airbnb like a ministry in exemplifying this ideal. They said, live your life without fear and well, that is advice I can accept.

Be aware that you wont have any privacy.
The place was clean though.
Owner replied to my texts right away, kuddos for that.
It has all the amenities.
We cleaned the house before we left and followed the owners rules.
We cleaned up after our dogs.
Ive been using AirBnB for over 3 years, and this is the first time we had to leave early, which is sad, but our safety comes first.
I guess this place is not for everybody.
